name: [WIP] BattleTops
description:
Spin to survive in this 3D platform brawler!

Play with up to 4 players using XBox controllers. It is a work in progress so there are bugs. Many bugs!

Objective: 
Spawn into the battle arena as a spinning top. Your health is how fast your spinning! Pick up power ups to be able to shoot weapons and slow down / defeat your opponents!

Controls: 
B - Spawn into the game
Left Bumper - Speed up (you cannot control movement, shoot, or jump while  doing this)
Right Bumper - Shoot (Shoot all available guns 1-4)
A - Jump (shoot your 5th gun below you)
Left Joystick - Move
